net.proteusframework.core.mail

Class EmailAddress

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.mail.EmailAddress

  • public class EmailAddress
extends Object
    Recipient / Address container for unparsed InternetAddresses.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)
